metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0400 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was discovered in linux kernel in the smc protocol stack, causing remote dos.

notes.Note: sbeattie> no fix available as of 2023.01.10
